function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sufficient policies and regulatory frameworks","Impact":"Failure to reach new emissions targets","Mitigation":"Implement stronger and more comprehensive policies and regulatory frameworks","Technologies":"","People":"National governments, policymakers","Owner":"National governments, policymakers"},{"Description":"Division within the EU regarding energy transition","Impact":"Potential reluctance to embrace the energy transition, leading to slower progress","Mitigation":"Facilitate dialogue and collaboration between western and eastern EU member states to address concerns and find common ground","Technologies":"","People":"EU member states","Owner":"EU member states"},{"Description":"Backtracking of major players on national level commitments","Impact":"Delay or reversal of progress in achieving climate goals","Mitigation":"Encourage and support national governments to uphold and strengthen their commitments to climate action","Technologies":"","People":"National governments, international organizations","Owner":"National governments, international organizations"}]}
